mapper.select: SELECT d.TaxPrice AS retialPrice,d.Yqty AS amount,d.smb_id AS id ,c.name AS manufacturer, d.Batchno AS lotNo, p.name AS goodsName, p.standard AS specification FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_RecBill_D d LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_Products p ON d.p_id=p.p_id LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_clients c ON c.c_id=d.Supplier_id WHERE d.bill_id=#{orderId} AND d.DealStates=#{status}
